name: The Psychopath Test
description:
Late Submission to the GMTK Game Jam 2020.

Play as a detective who has to figure out, amongst a crowd of suspects, who a Psychopathic Serial Killer is.

Known Bugs:

Attempting to kill a Control Member (Blue Badge guys) will actually  kill them.

Rarely, when the shutter closes, it will squeak.

Holding down [G][M][T][K] will somehow skip the menu intro...
